tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE landfill_costs (
    landfill_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    cost_type VARCHAR,
    cost_description TEXT,
    cost_amount DECIMAL,
    cost_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE revenue_streams (
    stream_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    stream_type VARCHAR,
    stream_description TEXT,
    stream_amount DECIMAL,
    stream_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_costs (
  cost_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cost_category VARCHAR(50),
  cost_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE revenue_streams (
  revenue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  revenue_category VARCHAR(50),
  revenue_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE budget_allocation (
  allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  allocation_category VARCHAR(50),
  allocation_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_costs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    cost_type VARCHAR(50),
    cost_description TEXT,
    cost_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE revenue_streams (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    revenue_type VARCHAR(50),
    revenue_description TEXT,
    revenue_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE budget_allocation (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    department VARCHAR(50),
    allocation_description TEXT,
    allocated_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE resource_optimization (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    optimization_strategy TEXT,
    performance_metric DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_operations (
  landfill_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  operation_date DATE,
  operation_type VARCHAR,
  operation_cost DECIMAL,
  operation_revenue DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_expenses (
  expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_id UUID,
  expense_item VARCHAR,
  expense_amount DECIMAL,
  expense_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_revenue (
  revenue_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_id UUID,
  revenue_source VARCHAR,
  revenue_amount DECIMAL,
  revenue_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_staff (
  staff_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_id UUID,
  staff_name VARCHAR,
  staff_role VARCHAR,
  staff_salary DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_budget (
  budget_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_id UUID,
  budget_category VARCHAR,
  budget_allocation DECIMAL,
  budget_date DATE
);
